about_the_game:
Are you a fan of sarcasm, the 90s, and pineapples? Then Pineapple Panic! is the game for you!

In Pineapple Panic!, you play as Piña, a sarcastic pineapple on the run from the temperamental chef, Joe Colada, who is determined to turn you into a delicious beverage. In this endless runner the main goal is simple, survive as long as you can without getting caught by Joe Colada. He'll say anything to get you to slow down, so stay sharp!

Maintain your distance from Joe by jumping over and dodging obstacles.


Collect pineapple chunks to earn a unique ability that you can use to slow Joe down.


Challenge yourself with the Leaderboard system, which allows you to see the top scores.


Meet Piña:


Life as a pineapple isn't easy, according to Piña. Between beach lounging and long naps, Piña never imagined he'd be sprinting for his life. Everything changed when Joe Colada started chasing him, turning his peaceful life into an endless escape.

Meet Joe Colada:


With a flair for dramatic presentations and a relentless pursuit of culinary perfection, Joe Colada is always looking for the finest ingredients. And he believes Piña is the pièce de resistance he needs.

Why will you love Pineapple Panic?
Humor and Sarcasm: Piña's witty commentary and the game's humorous take on the endless runner genre will keep you entertained.
Retro Aesthetic: Relive the 90s with vibrant visuals and a catchy, nostalgic soundtrack.

Challenging Yet Fun: The game is easy to pick up but hard to master, providing endless fun and replayability.

Note: No pineapples were harmed in the making of this game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 13.6 Ventura
  • Processor: Intel and Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630 1536 MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 13.6 Ventura
  • Processor: Intel and Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630 1536 MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

name: Pineapple Panic!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 or AMD Phenom II X6 1100T
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti or Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Have your games become bland and fruitless? Help Pina, the terrified pineapple, to dodge and leap over obstacles so that he can outwit the dastardly Chef Joe Colada in this rear-facing endless runner. Can you outpace his culinary madness, or will you end up in a fruity predicament?
